attributes.action: Get child maintenance to change there whole system!
attributes.additional_details: Child maintenance shouldn’t make a parent pay if the other parent is forcing the them out of the child’s life for more money in there back pocket. Child maintenance should only calculate payments after tax and take into consideration a lot more factors instead of saying to the paying parent “paying csa is more important” meaning child maintenance is more important then keeping a roof over your head. Child maintenance go about everything completely wrong!
attributes.background: The child maintenance system is ridiculous. They take advantage of fathers mainly! There fees are extremely high they only work out payments before tax! Parents shouldn’t have to pay if said parent is forced not to see there child!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about how child maintenance works at present, but we're not sure exactly how you'd like arrangements for child maintenance to be changed.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We currently have the following petitions open on this issue, which you might like to sign:

Change child maintenance calculations from gross annual earnings to Net earnings
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641721

Recalculate child maintenance payments for income changes below 25% threshold
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639060

Stop child maintenance payments if receiving parent blocks contact with children
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644552
